column4: Hello...   I'm somewhat new to ubuntu (i.e. fairly new to ubuntu, but long-time debian user before).  Can anyone tell me how to "fix" initrd images? I tried upgrading from breezy to dapper, but the new kernel won't boot (won't find boot device from the mounted RAM disk)

how did it get out of "booting" shape?
